description: LEGO IPOD TOUCH CASE: CREATE, PLAY, PROTECT. Belkin and the LEGO Group partnered up to bring to life our shared belief in people, big and small, and the potential of their imaginations. The iPod touch LEGO case is the first fully functional, fully customizable case for iPhone 5 and iPod touch. A protective case that's fun to play with -it's the best of both worlds.
title: Belkin iPod touch 5th Generation LEGO Case / Shield (Red / Blue)
